title: Imposter Space Jumper
description: Welcome to our newest game Imposter Space Jumper game. The goal of the game is to jump between two objects. If the Impostor jumps too high, he will touch the upper spiky ceiling and he will explode. Try to stand up on the platform to earn points. Try not to touch the upper spiky ceiling. Enjoy and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: ZigZag Bridges
description: ZigZag Bridges is a fast paced endless running game that will put the player's reflexes to the ultimate test. Tap to rotate and cross bridges as the main character approaches them.
instructions: It is played with the mouse.

title: Bhaag Santa Bhaag
description: Santa Claus needs to pass all levels in this game and to collect gifts for all kids of the world. Your job is to help Santa to do all tasks and to get him safe to the finish. Jump over obstacles, avoid rocks and other objects that can hurt Santa. Walk thru platforms and collect all gifts. Pass all levels and have fun.
instructions: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

title: Hit The Christmas Elves
description: Welcome to our newest winter Christmas game called Hit The Christmas Elves. In this game, the snowman has to throw snowballs and destroy the blocks with the elves. Each block has the appropriate number of hits that you have to hit it. Very fun and interesting free Christmas game. Enjoy!!!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Fish Love
description: Save fish from danger, bombs, lava and crab and give the fish just love. They cannot live without each other. Beautiful and pleasant music, sound effects, bright and colorful graphics accompany you through all the puzzles of this game. Start your adventure now. Good luck in love !!!
instructions: Touch on screen.

title: Test Your Love
description: Write your names on the boxes and test how strong your love is. Remember that this is just a fun game. This has nothing to do with reality. By chance, the numbers come out. Have fun!
instructions: LEFT CLICK / TOUCH

title: SANTA DART GAME
description: In this game, you are at the Christmas party, your task is to throw Darts at the target, and do not harm the poor guy. The closer you get to the centre, the more points you get. This game will help you to distract and relax. The game is bright and interesting.
instructions: Use a mouse to play the game.

title: Baby Princesses Wonderful Christmas
description: Baby Princesses Wonderful Christmas Little princesses Eliza, Jasmin, Tiara, Rosehip, Cinderella, Mermaid getting ready for the most wonderful holiday of the year - Christmas! Let's help the little ones choose cute trendy outfits for the Christmas ball. Just look how many sweetie dresses, skirts, shoes and blouses the princesses have in their wardrobe. All outfits sparkle and shimmer in the light of festive garlands. Don't forget to choose an evening hairstyle for each princess. Have a lot of fun playing the game Baby Princesses Wonderful Christmas on the site Dressupwho.com.
instructions: Mouse and Finger

title: Bunny Graduation Double
description: Two cute blue and purple bunnies escape from the forest. They must escape from the forest because everything is getting snow white more and more. they need to reach the guard at the end of each level reach the guard and pass the levels!
instructions: *Purple Rabbit Control : WASD *Blue Rabbit Control : Arrow Keys *Double Jump Available

title: Random Stop
description: This is a puzzle shooter game. The goal of the game is to hit the yellow ball with smaller white ball. Yellow ball will move randomly and without warning. After each time when you hit or miss the yellow ball she will move randomly at other position. You need to shoot fast because the yellow ball will move constantly. You can make three mistakes before game over. So with three balls you need to make best score.
instructions: Tap on screen to shoot.

title: Switch
description: An exciting game of speed and reaction in which you need to destroy colorful falling balls with a platform in time. Earn points, set new records and get into the leaderboard!
instructions: Click on the screen to change the platform color.

title: Family Farm
description: Welcome to Family Farm! Grow your farm by planting and growing crops. Firstly, you need to have an available plot to plant. Buy it with your money. Then, open the shop to buy a seed and plant it on the plot. Harvest the profit once the production time is finished. You can sell a crop to plant another one. You can also upgrade the crops to increase their productivity. Enjoy the game and let's become a bonafide farmer!
instructions: Click the "shovel" button and choose a plot to buy it. Click the "dollar sign" button to sell crops. Click the "leaf" button to upgrade productivity. Buy seeds and special items in the shop. Click the crops once the production time is finished to collect golds. Click the "gift" button to visit the lucky wheel where you can spin to win prizes. Visit the game everyday to earn daily reward (an extra spin).

title: The Walls
description: Do you like arcade games? The wonderful The Walls are waiting for you. Avoid different color balls. If the ball touches you, you lose the game. You can grow with balls of the same color.
instructions: It is played with the mouse.

title: Snaklaus
description: Snaklaus is a casual and fun game. Your objective is to collect as many presents as possible to increase points. There are 2 game modes available, classic mode and hard mode. Choose what you prefer and have fun!
instructions: Arrow Keys or Touch on screen.

title: Queen of Pop
description: The Queen is back! In this music rhythm game, wait for the pop music notes to drop, and tap at the right moment. Don't miss a note. Three strikes and you're out!
instructions: Let the rhythm guide you

title: GAPS
description: Gaps is a simple 3D arcade game template that anyone can enjoy! Tap or click on the screen to shoot the ball between obstacles. Watch for the gap obstacles. How far can you reach?
instructions: How to play? On mobile: Tap on the screen to shoot the ball between obstacles. On desktop/web: Click on the screen to shoot the ball between obstacles.

title: Merge Fish
description: You have to merge three or more fish to get more points. In this HTML5 game, by tapping on the side fish they will enter the puzzle board. You should set them in a correct order and let them merge and become a different color fish.
instructions: by tapping on the side fish they will enter the puzzle board and you can merge them and get score.

title: Red and Green Christmas
description: How would you like to play the last and special part of the red and green game series? Unlike other series, there is a portal in the new year's special section, jump from the portal and overcome the obstacles, save your friend, reach the door, complete the sections.
instructions: *Move to WASD + Arrow Keys *Double Jump available *Mobile Touch Control

title: Flex Run
description: Help the agile gymnast dodge all the obstacles in a fun "Flexible" run. Home furniture acts as obstacles here. For each evasion, you are awarded points for which you can customize the game character. Show all your flexibility!
instructions: Control the gymnast with the mouse or keyboard and dodge all the furniture that moves towards the meeting.

title: DOP 2 Delete One Part
description: DOP 2: Delete One Part is a fabulous puzzle game. Are you seeking ways to help your children devolop their thinking ability and improve their intelligence? This game might do you a favor.
instructions: Click and drag to play.

title: Winter Trucks Jigsaw
description: This truck game is a jigsaw puzzle game. The game has twelve images with Winter trucks. You can play in all of them. But first you need to go to he first one and to solve, then you can unlock next image. So tap on the available image to play and choose the mode that you want to play. You can play easy with 25 piece of the image, medium with 49 or hard with 100 pieces. Tap on the pieces to move and put on the position to get the image.
instructions: Tap on screen to play, Drag the pieces on the position to get image.

title: Knife Jump
description: Knife Jump--it's a easy control and simple game, you just tap to flip the knife and slice amazing obstacles in juiciest way.Cut or slice everything and become slice master!
instructions: Tap to flip the knife and slice amazing obstacles in juiciest way

title: Helicopter Mega Splash
description: Swing your helicopter’s wrecking ball and smash attacking opponents. This action game won’t leave a dry eye in the house - you’ll fight against hordes of oncoming enemies. Collect power-up items to transform your helicopter into an all-destroying fighting machine. A new challenge awaits you each day at midnight. How long will you survive? - Swing the wrecking ball by touch - Fight and destroy hordes of enemies - Collect power-up items and use super weapons - New level awaits you each day - Feel the adrenaline-pumping, rocked out soundtrack Warning! Warning! Not for weak nerves! Helicopter Mega Splash will take you to your limits!
instructions: Touch to move your helicopter around and swing your wrecking ball into incoming enemies to survive.

title: Swipe The Pin
description: Swipe The Pin is a fun and challenging game. The game fills the glass container with the colored balls that are blocked by the pins. Touch on the pin to open the path of the ball, and put the ball into the glass case. When the container is full / there are no balls left, a complete level popup will appear. Tap to go to the next level.
instructions: Touch on the pin.

title: Push Balls
description: In this game there are two balls of different colors in the top part of the game screen which move horizontally, the same is in the down part of screen. Between them there is a ball that moves vertically. The object of the game is to control the balls in the top and down part and to touch only the balls of the same color. The middle ball changes color and therefore the balls that are positioned horizontally should be rotated. As you play the game the speed of the ball will increase.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Time Witch
description: Time Witch is a puzzle platformer where you control a witch with the power to distort time. Use wisely that power to help her to evade enemies and surpass obstacles.
instructions: Desktop: -A, D, or arrow keys to move. -W, H, Up Arrow key, or space bar to jump. -V, Y, I, or Space to Distort the Time. Mobile: -Touch controls.

title: Santa On Wheelie Bike
description: How Long Can You Hold The Wheelie? Santa On Wheelie Bike is a fun addictive casual game. Balance the bike on one wheel as far as you can. Try to perform the longest wheelie ever and celebrate this Christmas with the Santa.
instructions: Use Mouse To PlayThe Game

title: Dalgona Candy
description: Are you ready for a fun and popular puzzle game? With the Squidly Game Dalgona Candy game, you have to use a needle to remove the shape you have chosen from the candy molds. Since the candy mold is hard and fragile, you should carefully remove the shape. If you break the candy, it's game over! You have to click the button periodically to remove the candy without breaking it. If you click a lot and set the "Crack Meter" to the red level, the candy will break. Also, if you don't remove the candy within the given time, the game is over. For this and more games, please visit meyagames.com. Have fun.
instructions: Mouse click or Space.

title: Fallen Balls
description: Touch the screen to shoot with the white ball. When the white ball is over yellow ball you need to shoot or to touch the screen again to destroy yellow ball. When two balls are matched you need to tap the screen to destroy the ball. Try to destroy more yellow balls as you can before you miss the target. Get best score and have fun.
instructions: Tap on screen to play

title: Santa Slide
description: Santa Claus is stuck. In 60 levels, you must help Santa Claus by moving the sliding ice blocks so that he has his way clear! Don't think your task will be easy, use your mind to solve the puzzles!
instructions: Slide the blocks to move them. Your goal is make a way to the Santa left the grid!

title: Mermaids Tail Rush
description: Help the beautiful mermaid grow her tail! The little mermaid wants to have the longest tail in the underwater world, let us help her achieve her wish. You can control the mermaid to collect different colored tails. Be careful of the terrifying obstacles on the road, and don't let the little mermaid's tail be cut off.
instructions: Slide to move

title: Redball Another world
description: A fascinating 3D arcade game about a red ball. You have to overcome obstacles and destroy opponents for a while to get to the end of the level. Your best result will be recorded in the table of records. The game has 15 levels (3 worlds)
instructions: The main goal of the game is to get to the end of the level Controls on the PC: -WASD(move) -Spacebar (jump) Mobile controls: -Left stick- move -Right button (jump)

title: Pinatamasters 2
description: Its time to shoot the pinatas again! All you have to do is shoot and destroy all the pinatas. Dont let them escape or move. Destroy eight crazy pinatas and collect all the money to upgrade your weapons. Lot guns are waiting for you such as knives, pistols, laser guns, grenades, machine guns, plasma guns and explosives and many action in more than 100 levels.
instructions: Instructions: Use the mouse to play it on desktop to aim or touch the screen on mobile devices.

title: 10x10 Winter Gems
description: 10X10 Winter Gems is a fun online matching game. In this game, you need to make perfect rows and columns of blocks. Place the different shapes of blocks strategically under the grid and try to complete rows and columns. When you form a complete row or column, the row or column gets removed from the grid. But be careful, while placing the blocks, because the game gets over if there is no space left. So, make a strategy in your mind before placing the blocks. Place more and more blocks under the grid to make a high score. So, what are you waiting for? Play 10X10 Winter Gems and take your tetris skills to the next level.
instructions: Drag and drop blocks

title: Super Tankers
description: My tank special cow is a very interesting tank battle game. In the game, players can manipulate tanks with various performance advantages to fight. The game process is tense and exciting, and the content is rich and wonderful. Players can easily experience the power of tanks as a weapon of war. There are various ways to play the game. Interested players, come and experience it!
instructions: Use the mouse and touch to shoot the cannons

title: Santa's Christmas Fishing
description: Santa went on Christmas fishing. Help him catch as many fish as possible and reach the bottom of the sea. Even presents with Christmas decorations float in the water. Grab them and decorate the Christmas tree in Santa's room.
instructions: Tap the screen to drop your fish hook into the water. Swipe your finger across the screen to catch fish, diamonds and presents and avoid catching garbage. Upgrade your bucket size to catch even more fish, increase their price and reach deeper depths.

title: Santa Chase
description: Complete missions in snowy and fun levels and build your gift train as long as possible while escaping from the cops in this new year themed game. Santa needs your help!
instructions: Touch left/right side of the screen to steer on mobile. Press left/right keys to steer on desktop.

title: Fruit Master
description: Throw the knives carefully and try to slash multiple fruits at once to get bonus score! DO NOT MISS! You'll get one cocktail per every level completed.
instructions: Tap to throw the knives.

title: Santa Claus Merge Numbers
description: Welcome to our newest Christmas game called Santa Claus Merge Numbers. The goal of the game is to merge two same numbers. The numbers are from 1 to 9. When you reach the number 9, the whole row is released and is empty. Enjoy and have fun!!!
instructions: Use a mouse to play this game.

title: Kill the Dummy
description: Unsheathe your saw and start the juicy carnage with the classic game mode "cut and destroy". Experience the thrill of setting a new high score in the endless Classic mode as you focus on dodging bombs and slicing massive dummies with the help of the powerfull Saws. Just avoid the bombs and make sure you don’t drop the dummy!
instructions: Touch and drag to cut.

title: Secret of Amun
description: Secret of Amun Slot Machine takes you into Ancient Egypt! This captivating free slot machine gets you familiar with the depths and mysterious vaults of the pyramids. Great treasures are waiting to be discovered by you! Don’t miss them and spin the reels to grab them.
instructions: Set bet and spin the reels to grab great treasures and tons of coins for a lasting gaming experience. The more coins you risk, the bigger your reward can be.

title: Snake Rush
description: The Snake is in an infinite race and the red Snake intends get all the score possible. Very easy to play but very hard to hit the high scores. It’s time to step into the world of snake adventure and experience the most enjoyable and entertaining journey of all time. Control the snake and slink through challenging levels at top speed. Avoid the walls and earn score. It is a game of skill, reflexes and more, try it and you're sure to enjoy it.
instructions: Touch and drag to move the Snake.

title: Kawaii Fishy
description: Kawaii Fishy is now release! You objectives are collect all the fishy, avoid all the enemies! Those guy will jump out from the sea! How to play? - Drag the net (items) to get fish! - Fishy jump out the sea random! - Unlock catch net skins & others fishy! Features: - Cutes sea animal! - Shop unlock character - Multi level hard - Coins jumper Thanks for playing ! If you have any idea just comment or email us!
instructions: - Drag the net (items) to get fish! - Fishy jump out the sea random! - Unlock catch net skins & others fishy!

title: DOP: Delete One Part 4
description: Erase part and solve the puzzle! Let's see what is your IQ level We bet you will not pass all levels! Huge amount of different and interesting levels! Download the best Puzzle game ever made! Challenge yourself to try to PASS ALL LEVELS! It's fun and easy to play! Just touch the screen and drag your finger to erase the party of the drawing and see what lies behind it. For the first, you can find it very easy but there is a lot of challenging levels prepared especially for you! Turn on your creativity and mind on the max level to solve all Puzzles. And believe spending time to get cleverer is the best way to be successful! Enjoy!
instructions: Erase It and win

title: Candy Maker Factory
description: Last week we received an invitation from the Magic Candy Land! The manager of the Magic Candy Land invited us to have a crazy candy factory one-day-tour! We feel so lucky to have this rare opportunity! We were so delighted that this day has finally come! A shuttle bus takes us to our destination! Here we come! So many candy factories around us! Such as candy ring factory, rock candy factory, gummy candy factory, pretzel factory and chocolate bar factory! The manager going to bring us to visit each of them and teach us how to make those yummy candies with cooking tools and machines! Oh my god! We are totally in love with this place! Do you want to join us to this wonderful place and cook candies with us? Come on! Let’s get start right now!
instructions: How to play: - Use interactive controls to play the game - Try different cooking tools and machines to make your yummy foods - Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods - Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies and fruits

title: Flashing Square
description: In this game there is a square and a ball in the square. The ball will move through the square and collide with the edges of the square. But the square can flash when you touch it. You need to touch the square whenever the ball bounces off the edge of the square and then the ball can bounce and continue playing. If you miss the moment and the edges will flash sooner or later from the touch of the ball, the game is over.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Drop The Gift
description: Be Santa in this Santa simulator! Drop the gifts in the chimneys to win, but be careful not to crash into any of the birds that want to steal your gifts!
instructions: Mouse/Touch: Push the left button to move, Push the right button to Keyboard: Up/Down = movement Spacebar = drop a gift

title: Human Vehicle
description: Collect stickmen to become the cooler vehicles. Avoid obstacles. Collect gems to buy new vehicles. 20+ unique vehicles. 50+ unique levels. 5+ environmetns.
instructions: Tap to Start Slide to control

title: Tap Tap Colors
description: Tap Tap Colors is an flappy shooter gameplay with most simple tap gameplay. Collect Power Ups like "3 Bullets", "Slow Speed" or "1 Score" to make your work more easy.
instructions: Tat to jump.

title: Super Penguboy
description: “Super Penguboy” is a very fun and colorful side scrolling game! Help the little penguin to defeat his enemies and go through obstacles and traps. Collect all coins to get big points! Beat all the levels collecting all the stars and have fun in this amazing game!
instructions: A - Move Left D - Move Right W - Jump J - Jetpack K - Parachute L - Laser Gun - Compatible with Gamepad - Mobile Controls
